name: Echomaze
description:
You are in a maze and you need to escape.

In the maze you will find doors and keys.

Use sounds to guide your way - if you collide with a wall, you will hear a sound.

The higher the pitch of the floor - the closer you are to the doors on given part of the maze.

For tiles which do not guide you to doors, there is the same "low" pitch - but usually only in the off-roads in the maze, you will find the key.

If you hear the applause - that means you successfully completed the game.

Instructions:

You should be able to pass the game without looking at the screen (it's challenging!).

WSAD - movement

ESC - quit

1 - restart

Advanced (not needed to pass the game - not recommended for first playthrough):

Mouse - rotating your character

Left Mouse Button - shooting to determine how far from you is wall
